articles.author: Zahra Tayeb
articles.title: Russia applauds OPEC+ for its huge oil output cut, reportedly saying it will counter the 'mayhem' the US has created in the market - Yahoo Canada
articles.description: "This at least balances the mayhem that the Americans are causing," Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said of the OPEC+ production cuts, per media reports.
articles.content:
Russia's government has hailed OPEC+ for making a massive cut to oil production targets, reportedly saying it balances out the "mayhem" the US has spread in global energy markets.
